reminders.complete: Choosing  "Confirm Poll" does not mean that your polling is completed.  You must wait for the staff to confirm your identity before the poll is completed.
reminders.identify:
To confirm your identity, the polling station staff will use station equipment to scan the above QR code before confirming your poll. The QR code only works for identity confirmation and will not reveal your voting preferences.

The program will automatically delete all the data you entered after you exit this application.
reminders.yfuntcony: Please ensure that you are a registered voter of Health Services. If you are a registered voter of other functional constituencies, please go to polling stations of your geographical constituency to vote.
reminders.nfuntcony: If you are a registered voter of the Health Services, please go to the designated polling stations. This is not the station for you to vote.

vote.message: Are you sure you want to poll for {{ field }} ? No altering is allowed once the polling is confirmed.

finish.message: The program will automatically delete all the data you entered after you exit this application. After Confirmed, please press again "Finish Polling(Staff Only)"

qrscanner.prompt: Place the QR Code in the scanning area

agreement.title: Privacy and Terms and Conditions
agreement.tou:
POPVote 4.0

Personal Information Collection Statement

Last Updated on {{ lastUpdate }}

  1. Collection of Personal Information
    1. PopVote collect and use your personal information, which include: (a) HKID 4 Digits before bracket; (b) Date of Issue of HKID; (c) Day of Birthday, to generate a unique hash ID.
    2. When you use PopVote, you may be asked to provide part of your identity card number, the issue date of your identity card and day of your birthday. Once you transmit any information of your identity card number to us, your device, the system shall hash the numbers to become an unique and garbled codes and stored into database. The codes are generated is to avoid duplicate voter ID. PopVote does not retain your partial data of your identity card.
  2. Use of Personal Information
    1. We collect your personal information for the purposes of:-
      • (a) identity verification to avoid duplicate votes identity;
      • (b) use, operation and participation in PopVote;
      • (c) statistic & analysis; and
      • (d) disclosure of the anonymous results of any statistics & analysis.
    2. Unless we obtain your authorization, we do not use your personal information to transmit any advertisements of PopVote to you.
    3. Under no circumstances, we will use your personal information to provide you with any advertisement for any third parties.
  3. Disclosure of Personal Information
    1. PopVote does not store any personal data. We only retain the unique hash ID generated from your personal data. Unless in the following circumstances, we do not provide the stored data to a third party:-
      • (a) to abide by a court order or comply with applicable law or respond to valid legal process, including from law enforcement or other government agencies;
      • (b) to protect an individual from the loss of life or serious injury of anyone;
      • (c) to operate and maintain the security of PopVote, including to prevent or stop an attack on our computer systems or networks; or
      • (d) to protect the rights or property of PopVote.
    2. Up to the last updated date of this PICS, PopVote has received 0 request from the law enforcement or other government agencies to request personal information and PopVote has rejected 0 times of such request.
  4. Storage & Processing of Personal Information
    1. PopVote shall store all the collected personal information in an Amazon Web Services (AWS) server located in Hong Kong.
    2. We collect and process your personal information in accordance with this PICS and the law of Hong Kong.
  5. Retention of Personal Information
    1. All the personal information shall be deleted from the server one week after the completion of each voting.
  6. Security of Personal Information
    1. PopVote is committed to protecting the security of your personal information.
    2. We use a variety of security technologies and procedures to help protect your personal data from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. For example, we will have internal audit control of the procedures and system; we store the personal data you provide on computer systems that have limited access and are in controlled facilities; and when we transmit highly confidential data (such as a credit card number or password) over the Internet, we protect it through the use of encryption and the data is converted into a chain of hash codes stored in the database and converted into a chain of Hash Codes marked on the server; all staff of the PopVote execute a confidentiality agreement to pledge to protect your personal information etc..
  7. Changes of this PICS
    1. If necessary, we will update this PICS. When we announce our updates, we will revise the "Last Updated" date at the top of this PICS.
  8. Contact Us
    1. Should you have any enquiries about your submitted personal information, you may contact us via popvote@pori.hk.

You understand and agree:

  • (i) that POPVote, is an activity to collect public opinion. It does not replace nor intend to replace any election based on the nature of any lawful practice or established mechanism;
  • (ii) to enter all information carefully and accurately because changes are not allowed after submission is confirmed;
  • (iii) to follow the organisers' procedural instructions to vote;
  • (iv) to make sure that any messages sent do not contain any virus or elements that might affect the voting operation, or cause any harm, interference or reduction to the information collected by PopVote; and
  • (v) to the Personal Information Collection Statement of PopVote.
